channel.title: Save On The Persol PO2996V
channel.description: In 1917, an optician from Turin, Giuseppe Ratti, decided to design and make glasses and lenses for those that needed the best protection for their eyes; pilots and sports drivers. The ‘Protectors’ were a result of this. Glasses made with maximum comfort, safety and visual clarity. The Italian military noticed these glasses and adopted them [...]

item.description:
In 1917, an optician from Turin, Giuseppe Ratti, decided to design and make glasses and lenses for those that needed the best protection for their eyes; pilots and sports drivers.
